articles.title: Less than a year to develop a COVID vaccine – here's why you shouldn't be alarmed - The Conversation UK
articles.description: Vaccines are being touted as taking seven to ten years to develop. But you shouldn't be worried that COVID vaccines only took less than a year.
articles.content: Im a clinical trials geek. I keep hearing people talk about the seven to ten years it takes to make a vaccine and how dangerous speeding this up might be. The word that keeps popping up is rushed, an… [+3984 chars]
